DOC.brief_summary: People elevate blood pressure high risk heart attack stroke people low blood pressure . Losing modest amount weight—such 15 20 pounds—can reduce risk heart attack stroke . However , often struggle maintain weight loss time . This study examine whether two behavioral weight-management program help people maintain weight loss time . In study , 346 adult randomly assign ( like flip coin ) one 12-month program follow 36 month ( i.e. , 3 year ) see body weight may change .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomized trial test efficacy cost-effectiveness novel module administer prior weight loss explicitly design enhance enjoyment healthy lifestyle behavior independent longer-term health effect , thus escalate proportion individual sustain ≥7 % weight loss long-term . Overweight/obese individual elevate blood pressure randomize one two 12-month weight-management intervention ( Fun First Weight Watchers ) follow 36 month . For Aim 1 ( Primary outcome ) , test whether Fun First efficacious Weight Watchers use mediator-intervention interaction model sufficient priori statistical power interaction effect well intervention mediator main effect . The posited mediator assess participant ' change enjoyment four key healthy lifestyle behavior ( heathy eating , physical activity , weigh self-nurturing ) via online survey 0-2 month . The primary outcome proportion participant lose clinically significant amount initial body weight maintain trial ( i.e. , lose > =7 % initial body weight 0-12 month gain < =5 lb 12-36 month ) , assess clinic scale in-person visit research clinic . Secondary outcome include proportion individual sustain ≥7 % weight loss trial assess digital cellular scale participant ' home participant ' change systolic blood pressure trial assess research clinic . For Aim 2 ( Other pre-specified outcome ) , test whether Fun First cost effective Weight Watchers use individual-level trial data system science model long-term , population-level hypertension cardiovascular disease incidence , health care disability cost , quality-adjusted life-years life course .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( BMI ) : 27 < = BMI < = 39 kg/m2 Inclusion Criteria ( Elevated Blood Pressure ) : Systolic blood pressure 120159 mmHg OR diastolic blood pressure 8099 mmHg . Can > =1 antihypertensive medication stable dose past 3 month Systolic blood pressure < 120 mmHg OR diastolic blood pressure < 80 mmHg , stable dose > =1 antihypertensive medication past 3 month Exclusion Criteria ( Blood Pressure ) : Elevated blood pressure : Systolic blood pressure > =160 mmHg OR diastolic blood pressure > =100 mmHg Exclusion Criteria ( Underlying medical conditions/diseases ) : Have heart attack , stroke , coronary heart disease , congestive heart failure , angina Have coronary artery bypass surgery cardiac catheterization percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ( PTCA ) , cath stent placement Have diabetes Have medical contraindication regular , unsupervised physical activity Have moderate severe asthma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disorder ( also call emphysema chronic bronchitis ) Had cancer past 5 year ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) Currently medical care digestive issue , gastrointestinal distress , abdominal pain , diarrhea Had organ transplant Exclusion Criteria ( Medications ) : Not stable medication past 3 month ( e.g. , cholesterol , thyroid , estrogenhormone , psychiatric ) Currently take prescription pain medication ( e.g. , Vicodin , Oxycodone ) Exclusion Criteria ( Weight diet relate ) : Have binge eat disorder bulimic compensatory symptom Currently take medication design lose weight Have undergo weightloss surgery ( e.g. , gastric bypass , lap band ) Have lose > 10 pound past 6 month Currently weightloss program ( e.g. , Jenny Craig ) Currently participate support group focus weight eat habit ( e.g. , Overeaters Anonymous ) Currently special diet serious health condition Not willing discontinue special diet ( e.g. , Atkins ) Exclusion Criteria ( Behavioral relate ) : Planning move next year Currently pregnant plan within next year Participating another research study No regular access mobile phone Internet Not able speak , read , understand English inform consent Not willing randomize Did complete eligibility process successfully timely manner Staff discretion judgement Live within Bay Area ( e.g. , ~1hour commute Stanford research center )
